action_title: Skunk cabbage:  Environmental control (e.g. shading, or promotion of native plants)
key_messages:
Key Messages:

No evidence was captured on the use of environmental control of skunk cabbage using shading or promotion of competitive native plants.

'No evidence' for an action means we have not yet found any studies that directly and quantitatively tested this action during our systematic journal and report searches. Therefore we have been unable to assess whether or not the action is effective or has any harmful impacts. Please get in touch if you know of such a study for this action.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
Environmental control which includes alterations to shade, and promotion of competitive native plants, may help to control spread of skunk cabbage Lysichiton americanus.
